feedback_items.title: Example: Add ability to edit past week entries
feedback_items.description: Users want to be able to correct mistakes in past entries
feedback_items.notes: This is an example feedback item. Delete or modify as needed.

feedback_items.title: Add PWA icon - running pixel-man
feedback_items.description: Implement a web app icon for the family_run application featuring a running pixel-man. When users create a home screen icon on iPhone (or any device), this icon should automatically show up. This requires: 1) Creating icon image files in multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512, apple-touch-icon), 2) Adding a manifest.json file for PWA support, 3) Adding appropriate meta tags to the HTML, 4) The icon design should be a simple pixel-art style running person that fits the app's theme
feedback_items.notes: Icon should be simple, recognizable, and work well at small sizes. Purple/blue color scheme to match the app gradient.
